titles.title: TARP Accountability Act of 2009
A bill to enhance disclosures regarding the use of funds under the Troubled Asset Relief Program, and for other purposes.
TARP Accountability Act of 2009

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: TARP Accountability Act of 2009 - Amends the Emergency Economic Stabilization Act of 2008 to require that the Secretary of the Treasury's 30-day Troubled Asset Relief Program (TARP) reports to Congress include information on the use of capital investments by each financial institution.
